snippet: The Senate overwhelmingly approved a measure Friday that would add Hinchliffe Stadium, one of the final remaining stadiums where Negro leagues baseball was played, to Great Falls National Historical Park in Paterson, N.J.
abstract: Senate approves measure that will add Hinchliffe Stadium, one of final remaining stadiums where Negro leagues baseball was played, to Great Falls National Historical Park in Paterson, NJ.
lead_paragraph: The Senate overwhelmingly approved a measure Friday that would add Hinchliffe Stadium, one of the final remaining stadiums where Negro leagues baseball was played, to Great Falls National Historical Park in Paterson, N.J.

headline.main: Parks Bill Includes Negro Leagues Stadium
headline.print_headline: Park Bill Includes Negro Leagues Stadium

keywords.value: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park
